<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a2e1cbb0e2bd7a35ed99c31853dc45374a3fd6b696867d70225deda7868308679b">EC</a> = Writer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystreamwriter/#afc0de5f4d1abba3ccf0d201137be8c6d">padToAlignment</a>(4))</Highlight></CodeLine>
